duties_responsibilities.duty: Sterilize and/or remove used laboratory materials (e.g., eggs, culture tubes, waste, etc.)
Wash, sterilize, and prepare labware for laboratory use
Run autoclave according to standard operating procedures
Perform general routine cleaning and maintenance of autoclaves and other equipment
Perform general housekeeping of laboratory facilities as assigned
Provide support duties for other laboratory personnel such as media preparation, restocking of disposables and glassware, and equipment monitoring
Perform all other related duties as assigned

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or General Education Degree (GED)
